release for Martin Luther King Day doesn't have much to do with civil rights, strictly speaking. It addresses the shooting of Rep. Gabrielle Giffords of Arizona and the rhetorical and budgetary attacks on public employees of recent months. ALBANY, NY( 01/14/2011)- The recent horrific events in Tuscon have saddened us all. However, from every tragedy lessons can be learned and the attention given by many to the contribution of violent rhetoric as cause for the shootings may be just the opening to bring civility back to our public discourse.
